kpi_info.title: MB max load ratio - EMB
kpi_info.use:
This is the maximum load of the message bus during the measurement period. KPI used for Ethernet based message bus.
This KPI is applicable to the CDS HLR NE.

This KPI is similar to msc_5016b. New KPI ID reference for CDS NE usage. This new KPI ID reference is to to be used starting from M15.1 report sets.
kpi_info.use_experience:
Must be used the RAW views since NetAct defined aggregated rules are AVG for TIME + NETWORK.

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS:(PLMN - MSC - UNIT) + (PLMN - HLR - UNIT) + (PLMN - CDS - UNIT)
KPI CLASS: Resource
MEASUREMENT(S): LAN EMB Load Measurement (293/125H)
